entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
